help-file.title: SHRIEK
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: General
The astounding vocal range of a Disharmonist has given them the ability to utilize their very voice as a weapon against their foe. The terrible shriek of the Disharmonist causes disturbing damage to the enemy despite taking a toll on their throat, forcing them to rest for a period of time before they can again strain their range to such a high limit.
